S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4496 Column list size mismatch with ORDER BY in INSERT statement
Fixed this issue which was due to missed occurences of RCL.size() that now (with ORDER BY in subqueries) need to be generalized to RCL.visibleSize to be able to ignore synthesized columns. Added a new test case for the failing repro. Also wired the OrderByInSubqueries test into the regression suite.
